notes: Cycle counts are in T-states (clock periods). The Z80 has unprefixed instructions plus CB (bit), DD (IX), ED (extended), and FD (IY) prefix groups. IX/IY instructions add 4 T-states over HL equivalents and use (IX+d)/(IY+d) displacement. For conditional instructions, first count is condition met, second is not met. Block instructions (LDIR, etc.) show repeat/single iteration counts.

instructions.notes: Halt CPU until interrupt or reset
Exchange top of stack with HL
Test bit b of register; (HL) variant=12T. 64 opcodes for 8 bits x 8 registers
Load register pair from memory; 4 opcodes for BC,DE,HL,SP
Input from port (C) to register; 7 opcodes for B,C,D,E,H,L,A
Load and increment; (DE)=(HL), BC--, DE++, HL++
DD prefix: IX index register variants. Add 4T to HL instruction times. 7 opcodes for B,C,D,E,H,L,A
ALU ops with (IX+d): all 19T. 8 opcodes for ADD,ADC,SUB,SBC,AND,XOR,OR,CP
FD prefix: IY variants identical to IX (DD) timing
